name: Confusion
info: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.

name: Growl
info: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokemon less wary. This lowers their ATK stat.

name: Jump Kick
info: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

name: Sonic Boom
info: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 100 HP damage.

name: Lick
info: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Smokescreen
info: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target accuracy.

name: Synthesis
info: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Pound
info: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

name: Vine Whip
info: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

name: Quick Attack
info: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. this move always goes first.

name: Karate Chop
info: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Whirlwind
info: The target is blown away, and a different Pokemon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokemon.

name: Acid
info: The opposing Pokemon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their S.DEF stat.

name: Sludge
info: Unsanitary sludge is hurted at the target. This may also poison the target.

name: Ember
info: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Sand Attack
info: Sand is hurled in the target face, reducing the target accuracy.

name: Razor Wind
info: In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing Pokemon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Sing
info: A soothing lullaby is sung in a claming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

name: Mist
info: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

name: Hypnosis
info: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

name: Confuse Ray
info: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

name: Rage
info: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the ATK stat each time the user is hit in battle.

name: Thunder Shock
info: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Water Gun
info: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

name: Horn Attack
info: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

name: Roar
info: The target is scared off, and a different Pokemon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokemon.

name: Pay Day
info: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

name: Rolling Kick
info: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick.

name: Agility
info: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises SPD stat.

name: Tail Whip
info: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokemon less wary and lowering their DEF stat.

name: Sweet Kiss
info: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

name: Charm
info: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers its ATK stat.

name: Growth
info: The user body grows all at once, raising the ATK and S.ATK stats.

name: Night Shade
info: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to 5 times of the user level.

name: Harden
info: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its DEF stat.

name: Leer
info: The user gives opposing Pokemon an intimidating leer that lowers the DEF stat.

name: Disable
info: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

name: Aurora Beam
info: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target ATK stat.

name: Low Kick
info: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move power.

name: Teleport
info: Use it to flee from any wild Pokemon. It can also warp the last Pokemon Center visited.

name: Metronome
info: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

name: Self-Destruct
info: The user attack everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints using this move.

name: Dragon Rage
info: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 200 HP damage.

name: Bubble
info: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokemon. This may also lower their SPD stat.

name: Rain Dance
info: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

name: Gust
info: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

name: Mirror Wave
info: The user counters the target by mimicking the target last move.

name: Tackle
info: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Fissure
info: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Bone Club
info: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Clamp
info: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

name: Meditate
info: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its ATK stat.

name: Mimic
info: The user copies the target last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokemon is switched out.

name: Constrict
info: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target SPD stat.

name: Scratch
info: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

name: String Shot
info: The opposing Pokemon are bound with silk blown from the user mouth that harshly lowers the SPD stat.

name: Scary Face
info: The user frightens the target with scary face to harshly lower its SPD stat.

name: Bubble Beam
info: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its SPD stat.

name: Withdraw
info: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its DEF stat.

name: Defense Curl
info: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its DEF stat.

name: Peck
info: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

name: Smog
info: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

name: Screech
info: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target DEF stat.

name: Spike Cannon
info: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

name: Flail
info: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move power.

name: Acid Armor
info: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its DEF stat.

name: Crabhammer
info: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Octazooka
info: The user attacks by spraying ink at the target face or eyes. This may also lower the target accuracy.

name: Rock Smash
info: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target DEF stat.

name: Endure
info: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Attract
info: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

name: Iron Defense
info: It raises the user DEF by 2 stages.

name: Bite
info: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Rapid Spin
info: A spin attack that can also eliminate such move as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

name: Feint Attack
info: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

name: Razor Leaf
info: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokemon. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Sweet Scent
info: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokemon evasiveness.

name: Swift
info: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokemon. This attack never misses.

name: Payback
info: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack power will be doubled.

name: Rock Polish
info: It raises the user SPD by 2 stages.

name: Ominous Wind
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a chance to increase all user stats at once.

name: Safeguard
info: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

name: Magnitude
info: The user attacks everything around it with a ground-shaking quake. Its powers varies.

name: Body Slam
info: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Cross Chop
info: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Stone Edge
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has an increased critical hit rario (up by 1 stage).

name: Endeavor
info: This attack move cuts down the target HP to equal the user HP.

name: Vital Throw
info: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.

name: Covet
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Twineedle
info: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

name: Pin Missile
info: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

name: Submission
info: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

name: Mega Punch
info: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

name: Brine
info: If the target HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

name: Sucker Punch
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack or has already attacked in this turn.

name: Nasty Plot
info: It raises the user S.ATK by 2 stages.

name: Avalanche
info: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

name: Flash Cannon
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 10% chance to lower the target S.DEF stat by 1 stage.

name: Trick Room
info: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokemon get to move first for five turns.

name: Hydro Pump
info: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

name: Swords Dance
info: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user ATK stat.

name: Spore
info: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

name: Rock Slide
info: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokemon to inflict damage. This may also make the opponent flinch.

name: Sharpen
info: The user makes its edges more jagged, which raises its ATK stat.

name: Sandstorm
info: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

name: Sunny Day
info: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

name: Hail
info: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pok&eacutemon except the Ice type.

name: Gyro Ball
info: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move power.

name: Assurance
info: Inflicts damage and will deal double damage if the target has already received damage on the turn it is used.

name: Vice Grip
info: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

name: Beat Up
info: The user gets all party Pokemon to attack the target. The more party Pokemon, the greater the number of attacks.

name: Fire Fang
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Fire Fang has 10% chance to put the target into Burned or Flinched status.

name: Psycho Cut
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has an increased critical hit ratio (up by 1 stage).

name: Charge Beam
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 70% chance to raise the user S.ATK by 1 stage.

name: Whirlpool
info: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

name: Frenzy Plant
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Player cannot give any order on the next turn.

name: Sleep Powder
info: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

name: Acupressure
info: It raises one of the target stats by 2 stages. Randomly chosen from ATK, DEF, S.ATK, S.DEF, SPD, Accuracy and Dodge.

name: Conversion
info: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move the top of the list of moves it knows.

name: Bonemerang
info: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the target twice, coming and going.

name: Mind Reader
info: The user senses the target movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

name: Barrier
info: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its DEF stat.

name: Moonlight
info: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Air Cutter
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has an increased critical hit ratio (up by 1 stage)

name: Water Pulse
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Water Pulse has 20% chance to put the target into Confused status.

name: Gravity
info: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusuable and negating Levitate.

name: Power Gem
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Bounce
info: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Volt Tackle
info: The user electrifies itself, then charges. It also damages the user quite a lot. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Punch
info: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Aqua Ring
info: The user regains 1/16 Max HP each turn.

name: Focus Blast
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 10% chance to lower the target S.DEF stat by 1 stage.

name: Embargo
info: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

name: Psywave
info: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

name: Charge
info: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn.

name: Dive
info: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.

name: Headbutt
info: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Take Down
info: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Air Slash
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Air Slash has 30% chance to put the target into Flinched status.

name: Yawn
info: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

name: Shadow Punch
info: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

name: Metal Burst
info: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it and deals 1.5 times damage.

name: Perish Song
info: Any Pokemon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

name: Rock Throw
info: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

name: Gunk Shot
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Gunk Shot has 30% chance to put the target into Poisoned status.

name: Absorb
info: A nutrient-draining attack. The user HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Dig
info: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

name: Zap Cannon
info: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and may cause paralysis.

name: Feint
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This also lifts the target Protect, Wide Guard or Quick Guard.

name: Glare
info: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

name: Lava Plume
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Lava Plume has 30% chance to put the target into Burned status.

name: Heat Wave
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Heat Wave has 10% chance to put the target into Burned status.

name: Blast Burn
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Player cannot give any order on the next turn.

name: Sheer Cold
info: Sheer Cold deals damage equal to the target Max HP, it cannot hit if the user has lower level than the target.

name: Waterfall
info: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

name: Dragon Claw
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Flare Blitz
info: The user receives 1/3 of the damage done. it has 10% chance to put the target into Burned status.

name: Thunder
info: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Zen Headbutt
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Zen headbutt has 20% chance to put the target into Flinched status.

name: Psych Up
info: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

name: Imprison
info: Put the user into Imprisoned status. The opposing Pokémon cannot use moves the user have.

name: Refresh
info: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn, or paralysis.

name: Blaze Kick
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has an increased critical hit ratio (up by 1 stage).

name: Mud Sport
info: Battlefield enters Mud Sport Status, Electric-type damage will be reduced.

name: Slash
info: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Horn Drill
info: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instanly if this attack hits.

name: Leech Seed
info: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

name: Rollout
info: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

name: Dragon Breath
info: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Future Sight
info: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psyhic energy attacks the target.

name: Shadow Claw
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has an increased critical hit ratio (up by 1 stage).

name: Focus Punch
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

name: Ice Punch
info: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Heal Bell
info: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all the party Pokémon.

name: Poison Powder
info: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

name: Leaf Storm
info: Attack the target and deal damage. it lowers the user S.ATK stat by 2 stages.

name: Tailwind
info: The user whips up a turbulent whrilwind that ups the SPD stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

name: Tail Glow
info: It raises the user S.ATK by 3 stages.

name: Mist Ball
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 50% chance to lower the target S.ATK stat by 1 stage.

name: Spite
info: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

name: Powder Snow
info: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokémon.

name: Transform
info: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

name: Explosion
info: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Amnesia
info: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user DEF stat.

name: Captivate
info: If any opposing Pokemon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which lowers its S.ATK stat by 2 stages.

name: Hyper Fang
info: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Seismic Toss
info: The target thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to 5 times of the user level.

name: Icy Wind
info: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokemon SPD stat.

name: Haze
info: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokemon engaged in batlle.

name: Thunder Wave
info: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

name: Twister
info: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pokemon. This may also make them flinch.

name: Ancient Power
info: The user attacks with prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user stats at once.

name: Silver Wind
info: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise all the user stats.

name: Double-Edge
info: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Shock Wave
info: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

name: Mud Bomb
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 30% chance to lower the target accuracy by 1 stage.

name: Will-O-Wisp
info: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

name: Hydro Cannon
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Player cannot give any order on the next turn.

name: Overheat
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It lowers the user S.ATK stat by 2 stages.

name: Extrasensory
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Extrasensory has 10% chance to put the target into Flinched status.

name: Steel Wing
info: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user DEF stat.

name: Knock Off
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Put the target into Knocked Off status.

name: Luster Purge
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 50% chance to lower the target S.DEF stat by 1 stage.

name: Double Hit
info: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Mega Drain
info: A nutrient-draining attack. The user HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Wrap
info: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: Bide
info: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

name: Dynamic Punch
info: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

name: Stomp
info: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Rock Tomb
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It lowers the target SPD stat by 1 stage.

name: Stun Spore
info: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

name: Healing Wish
info: The user faints. In return, the Pokemon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

name: Poison Gas
info: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokemon, poisoning those hit.

name: Supersonic
info: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

name: Poison Sting
info: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

name: Iron Head
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Iron Head has 30% chance to put the target into Flinched status.

name: Focus Energy
info: The user take a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

name: Reflect
info: A wondorus wall of light is put up to reduce damage from phsysical attacks for five turns.

name: Torment
info: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

name: Eruption
info: The user attacks opposing Pokemon with explosive fury. The lower the user HP, the lower the move power.

name: Counter
info: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

name: Detect
info: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if its used in succession.

name: Dragon Pulse
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Earth Power
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 10% chance to lower the target S.DEF stat by 1 stage.

name: Thrash
info: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Arm Thrust
info: The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

name: Triple Kick
info: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.

name: Encore
info: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

name: Hyper Voice
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Bullet Seed
info: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

name: Aqua Tail
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Tri Attack
info: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

name: Wing Attack
info: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

name: Slam
info: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

name: Aerial Ace
info: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

name: Psybeam
info: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

name: Sky Attack
info: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Superpower
info: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user ATK and DEF stats by 1 stage.

name: Solar Beam
info: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

name: Pursuit
info: The power of this attack move is doubled if its used on a target that is switching out of battle.

name: Fire Punch
info: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Petal Dance
info: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Fly
info: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn. This can also be used to fly to any familiar town.

name: Bullet Punch
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This attack always goes first.

name: Secret Power
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Close Combat
info: Attack the target and deal damage, It lowers the user DEF and S.DEF stat by 1 stage.

name: Kinesis
info: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target accuracy.

name: False Swipe
info: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Magnet Rise
info: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

name: Vacuum Wave
info: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

name: Double Kick
info: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

name: Mega Kick
info: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

name: Grudge
info: If the user faints, the user grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent move that knocked it out.

name: Punishment
info: The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move power, up to 200.

name: Ice Shard
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Ice Beam
info: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Fury Attack
info: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

name: Mud-Slap
info: The user hurls a mud in the target''s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

name: Spikes
info: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team feet. The trap hurts Pokemon that switch into the battle.

name: U-turn
info: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch placer with a party Pokemon waiting.

name: Giga Drain
info: A nutrient-draining attack. The user HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Night Slash
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has an increased critical hit ratio (up by 1 stage).

name: Metal Claw
info: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raises the user ATK stat.

name: Flash
info: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate dark caves.

name: Barrage
info: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

name: Splash
info: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all.

name: Conversion 2
info: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

name: Aeroblast
info: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Foresight
info: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal and Fighting type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

name: Milk Drink
info: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally HP.

name: Snore
info: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. the harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

name: Swagger
info: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target ATK stat.

name: Dream Eater
info: The user eats the dreams of a slpeeing target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.

name: Ice Fang
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Ice Fang has 10% chance to put the target into Frozen or Flinched status.

name: Curse
info: Ghost type loses half HP to make target lose 1/4 HP each turn, otherwise, raises ATK and DEF at expense of SPD.

name: Heal Block
info: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

name: Double Team
info: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

name: Worry Seed
info: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target Ability Insomnia.

name: Guillotine
info: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Dizzy Punch
info: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

name: Light Screen
info: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

name: Recover
info: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

name: Leech Life
info: The user drains the target blood. The user HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Lovely Kiss
info: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

name: Howl
info: It raises the user ATK by 1 stage.

name: Morning Sun
info: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Block
info: The user blocks the target way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

name: Power Swap
info: The user switches changes to its ATK and S.ATK stats with the target.

name: Seed Bomb
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Belly Drum
info: The user maximizes its ATK stat in exchange for HP equal to half of Max HP.

name: Roost
info: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Pluck
info: The user pecks the target. if the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: High Jump Kick
info: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. if it misses, the user is hurt instead.

name: Baton Pass
info: The user switches places with a party Pokemon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

name: Draco Meteor
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It lowers the user S.ATK stat by 2 stages.

name: Minimize
info: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

name: Shadow Ball
info: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target S.DEF stat.

name: Thunderbolt
info: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Cotton Spore
info: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing Pokemon, which harshly lowers their SPD stat.

name: Bone Rush
info: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

name: Fury Cutter
info: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

name: Egg Bomb
info: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

name: Miracle Eye
info: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

name: Last Resort
info: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

name: Fire Blast
info: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Lock-On
info: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the next attack does not miss the target.

name: X-Scissor
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Fury Swipes
info: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

name: Grass Knot
info: Attack the target and deal damage. The higher the target Weight, the higher the move power.

name: Protect
info: Enable the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Ice Ball
info: The user continually rolls into target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

name: Spark
info: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Super Fang
info: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp fangs. This cuts the target HP in half.

name: Comet Punch
info: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

name: Soft-Boiled
info: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally HP.

name: Guard Swap
info: The user switches changes to its DEF and S.DEF stats with the target.

name: Poison Jab
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Poison Jab has 30% chance to put the target into Poisoned status.

name: Energy Ball
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 10% chance to lower the target S.DEF stat by 1 stage.

name: Rock Climb
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Rock Climb has 20% chance to put the target into Confused status.

name: Facade
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

name: Surf
info: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

name: Skull Bash
info: The user tucks in its head to raise its DEF stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

name: March Punch
info: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Destiny Bond
info: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.

name: Toxic Spikes
info: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into the battle.

name: Sludge Bomb
info: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

name: Pain Split
info: The user adds its HP to the target HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.

name: Mirror Coat
info: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inclifting double the damage taken.

name: Wake-Up Slap
info: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.

name: Psycho Shift
info: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.

name: Strength
info: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. This can also be used to move heavy boulders.

name: Double Slap
info: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

name: Sleep Talk
info: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses on the the moves it knows.

name: Thunder Fang
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Thunder Fang has 10% chance to put the target into Paralyzed or Flinched status.

name: Flamethrower
info: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Hyper Beam
info: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user cant move on the next turn.

name: Drill Peck
info: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

name: Hammer Arm
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It lowers the user SPD stat by 1 stage.

name: Giga Impact
info: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. Player cannot give any order on the next turn except recharge.

name: Iron Tail
info: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target DEF stat.

name: Discharge
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 30% chance to put the target into Paralyzed status.

name: Outrage
info: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Trump Card
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This attack never misses. The fewer PP this move has, the greater its power.

name: Slack Off
info: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Poison Fang
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Poison Fang has 50% chance to put the target into Badly Poisoned status.

name: Memento
info: The user faints when using this move. In return, this lowers the target ATK and S.ATK stats by 2 stages.

name: Poison Tail
info: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Wring Out
info: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater the move power, up to 121.

name: Lucky Chant
info: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokemon from landing critical hits for five turns.

name: Power Whip
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Aura Sphere
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This attack never misses.

name: Ancient Force of God
info: Attack can cause extra damage equal to 10-30% max HP of the target (ATK+2 Boost unlock at Lv.6, Paralysis effect unlock at Lv.11)

name: Fake Out
info: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

name: Meteor Mash
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 20% chance to raise the user ATK by 1 stage.

name: Tickle
info: It lowers the target ATK and DEF stat by 1 stage.

name: Infinity Energy
info: It raises the user DEF and S.DEF by 1 stage.

name: Extreme Speed
info: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Rock Blast
info: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row.

name: Stockpile
info: The user charges up power and raises both its DEF and S.DEF stats by 1 stage. Spit Up and Swallow can be used after this. The move can be used three times.

name: Ingrain
info: The user lays roots that restore 1/16 max HP each turn. Because its rooted, it cant switch out.

name: Nightmare
info: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflict some damage every turn.

name: Crush Claw
info: Attack the target and deal damage. it has 50% chance to lower the target DEF stats by 1 stage.

name: Dark Pulse
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 20% chance to put the target into Flinched status.

name: Swallow
info: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP, raised DEF and S.DEF stats will be lost. Storing more power heals more HP.

name: Bug Buzz
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 10% chance to lower the target S.DEF stat by 1 stage.

name: Dragon Rush
info: If the target is in Minimized status, this attack will have doubled power and hit for sure. It has 20% chance to put the target into Flinched status.

name: Psychic
info: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force.

name: Bulk Up
info: It raises the user ATK and DEF by 1 stage.

name: Water Sport
info: The user soaks itself with water and weakens Fire-type moves during its presence.

name: Metal Sound
info: It lowers the target S.DEF stat by 2 stages.

name: GrassWhistle
info: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

name: Muddy Water
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 30% chance to lower the target accuracy by 1 stage.

name: Magnet Bomb
info: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack never misses.

name: Astonish
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Astonish has 30% chance to put the target into Flinched status.

name: Sacred Fire
info: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Sand Tomb
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Put the target into Bound status for five to six turns.

name: Reversal
info: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

name: Aromatherapy
info: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user party.

name: Smelling Salts
info: This attack power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target paralysis, however.

name: Fake Tears
info: It lowers the target S.DEF stat by 2 stages.

name: Odor Sleuth
info: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal and Fighting type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

name: Mirror Shot
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 30% chance to lower the target accuracy by 1 stage.

name: Toxic
info: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

name: Power Trick
info: The user employs its psychic power to switch its ATK stat with its DEF stat.

name: Brave Bird
info: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Wish
info: One turn after this move is used, the user or its replacement HP is restored by half the user Max HP.

name: Spit Up
info: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The power is equal to 100 X Stockpile times.

name: Signal Beam
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 10% chance to put the target into Confused status.

name: Flatter
info: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target S.ATK by 1 stage. If it cannon be raised, target wont be confused.

name: Crunch
info: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target DEF stat.

name: Taunt
info: The target is taunted into a rage that allow it to use only attack moves for three turns.

name: Needle Arm
info: Attack the target and deal damage. needle Arm has 30% chance to put the target into Flinched status.

name: Megahorn
info: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

name: Defog
info: It clears away fog from both fields, as well as any field effects. It also lowers the target Evasion by 1 stage.

name: Mud Shot
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It lowers the target SPD stat by 1 stage.

name: Rock Wrecker
info: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. Player cannot give any order on the next turn except recharge.

name: Leaf Blade
info: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Water Spout
info: Attack the target and deal damage. The lower the user HP, the higher the move power.

name: Shadow Sneak
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This move always goes first.

name: Cross Poison
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has an increased critical hit ratio (up by 1 stage). Cross Poison has 10% chance to put the target into Poisoned status.

name: Sky Uppercut
info: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

name: Magical Leaf
info: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

name: Gastro Acid
info: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target Ability.

name: Uproar
info: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokemon can fall asleep.

name: Force Palm
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Force Palm has 30% chance to put the target into Paralyzed status.

name: Icicle Spear
info: The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to five times in a row.

name: Stealth Rock
info: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokemon that switch into battle.

name: Plus Water Push
info: Attack the target and have 30% chance to flinch the target.

name: Magma Storm
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Put the target into Bound status.

name: Mega Thunder
info: Randomly attack 3-5 times, power increase as skill level up. (Paralysis Effect unlock at Lv.6, ATK+2 boost unlocked at Lv.11)

name: Brick Break
info: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Substitute
info: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user decoy.

name: Drain Punch
info: An energy-draining punch. The user HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Sea Wave
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 1.5 * X * Y, where X = original damage, Y = % self HP lost. (Flinch effect unlock at Lv.6, S.DEF+2 unlock at Lv.11)

name: Ghost Imprison
info: Attack and cause double damage if the enemy level can be devided exactly by 5. (Asleep Effect unlock at Lv.6, Target Def -2 debuff when skill is Lv.11)

name: Millions Wave
info: Attack and recover HP of 50% damage dealt. If enemy level can be divided exactly by 4, then get 100% HP recovered. (DEF+1 boost unlock at LV.6. Bound effect unlock at Lv.11)

name: Retaliate
info: The power of this move is doubled if the user teammate fainted the previous turn.

name: Psyshock
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Damage is based on the target DEF stat.

name: Work Up
info: Boosts the user ATK and S.ATK by 1 stage.

name: Icicle Crash
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Has a 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

name: Blizzard
info: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokemon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

name: Evil Strike
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 50% chance to decrease target DEF by 1 stage.

name: Mega Whirlpool (P)
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 30% lost HP of the target (ATK+2 Boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Doom Desire
info: Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the target with a concentrated bundle of light.

name: Judgment
info: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move type varies depending on the kind of Plate the user is holding.

name: Mega Whirlpool
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 30% lost HP of the target (S.ATK+2 boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Acrobatics
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Base Power doubles if the user has no held item.

name: Quick Guard
info: Protects the user and its allies from all priority attacks, barring Feint.

name: Blue Flare
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

name: Fairy Force
info: Attack and has 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Dragon Swarm
info: Attack the target and has 30% chance to boost SPD by 1 stage.

name: Twilight Power
info: Attack and deal damage. This move always confuse the target.

name: Dark Power
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This move always confuse the target.

name: Desert Whirlpool
info: Attack the target and has 50% chance to lower the enemy DEF 1 stage.

name: Phoenix Rage (P)
info: Attack and recover HP of 50% damage dealt. If enemy level can be divided exactly by 4, then get 100% HP recovered. (Burn effect unlock at Lv.6, ATK+2 boost unlock at Lv.12)

name: Space Claw
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Telekinesis
info: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

name: Mega Cut
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 30% lost HP of the target (Bound Effect unlock at Lv.6, ATK+2 boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Sludge Wave
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

name: Bulldoze
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Lowers the target SPD by 1 stage.

name: Relic Song
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Has a 10% chance to put target to sleep. If used by Meloetta, causes it to change from Aria Forme to Pirouette Forme.

name: Healing Heart
info: Restore 60% Max HP and increase the user S.DEF by 1 stage.

name: Flame Punch
info: Attack the target and has one higher chance to inflict critical damage.

name: Serious Impact
info: Attack the target and has 50% chance to increase user DEF by 2 stages.

name: Waveguide Slash
info: Attack target initially and deals damage. This move always goes first.

name: Magic Coat
info: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

name: Wood Hammer
info: The user slam its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Dark Matter Ball
info: Attack and reduce the target DEF by 1 stage.

name: Mega King Kick
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 20% * X damage. X = battle turns. (ATK+2 Boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Urtal Spin Attack
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to your last attack. (SPD+2 Boost unlock at Lv.6, ATK+2 Boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Mega Dragon Claw
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 20% * X damage, X = battle turns. (Confused Effect unlock at Lv.6, ATK+2 Boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Head Charge
info: Attack the target and deal damage. User takes one quarter of damage dealt in recoil.

name: Heal Pulse
info: Heals the target by 50% its max HP.

name: Hex
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Base Power doubles if target has a status condition.

name: Synchronoise
info: Attack the target and only damages Pokémon of the same type as the user.

name: Frost Breath
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Always results in a critical hit.

name: Night Daze
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Has a 40% chance to lower the target accuracy by one stage.

name: Undercurrent Vortex
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Bound the target for 5-6 turns.

name: God's Glory
info: Attack the target and has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Dimension Claw
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Thunder Clap
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Head Smash
info: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

name: Lunar Dance
info: The user faints. In return, the Pokemon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

name: Roar of Time
info: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. Player cannot give any order on the next turn except recharge.

name: Moongeist Beam

info: Attack the target an deal damage. It lowers the user S.ATK stat by 2 stages.

name: Fire Spin
info: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

name: Dragon Arrive
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a 50% chance to decrease the target S.DEF by 1 stage.

info: Attack and recover 30% * X HP from damage. X = dead ally Pokemon. (ATK+1 Boost unlock at Lv.6, Confuse effect unlock at Lv.11)

info: Attack and cause double damage if the enemy level can be devided exactly by 3. (Asleep Effect unlock at Lv.6, S.ATK+2 Boost unlock at Lv.11)

info: Attack the target and deal damage. This move have 50% chance to lower the target accuracy by 1 stage.

info: The user reflects the targets type, making it the same type as the target.

name: Techno Blast
info: Type will change depending on the users held Drive.

info: Attack the target and deal damage. Hits twice in a row.

info: Attack the target and deal damage. This move always results in a critical hit.

info: Boosts the user ATK and accuracy by 1 stage.

info: Attack and has 1 stage boost to critical hit.

info: Attack the target and has a 50% chance to reduce target S.DEF by 1 stage.

info: Attack the target and has 30% chance of causing the target to fall asleep.

info: Attack the target and has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Dragon Dance
info: It raises the user ATK and SPD by 1 stage.

info: Attack and cause extra 30% * X damage, X=Dead ally Pokemon. (Target get S.DEF -2 when skill is Lv.6. Bound Effect unlock at Lv.11)

info: Randomly attack 3-5 times, power increase as skill level up (Poison Effect unlock at Lv.11)

info: Attack and cause double damage if the enemy level can be devided exactly by 5. (Flinch Effect unlock at Lv.11)

info: Attack the target and deal damage. Base Power doubles when used on a poisoned target.

name: Low Sweep
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Lowers the target SPD by 1 stage.

info: Attack the target and deal damage. Lowers the target Speed by 1 stage.

info: Attack the target and has a 30% chance to increase user S.ATK by 1 stage.

info: Attack the target and deal damage. Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.

info: Attack the target and has 30% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Super Power
info: Attack the target and has a 50% chance to increase the user SPD by 1 stage.

info: Attack the target and has a 50% chance to reduce target S.DEF by 1 stage.

info: Attack the target and restore 30% of damage dealt.

info: Attack the target and has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Frozen Setting Sun

name: Crush Grip
info: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this move power, up to 121.

info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has an increased critical hit ratio (up by 1 stage).

info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has 40% chance to lower the target S.DEF stat by 2 stages.

name: Shadow Force

name: Extreme Rush
info: Attack and recover HP from 50% of damage dealt. If target HP is below 20%, then this moves turns into a K.O. (Confuse effect unlock at Lv.6, Bound effect unlock at Lv.11)

name: Cross Cutting
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 30% lost HP of the target. (S.DEF-2 debuff unlock at Lv.6, Bound effect unlock at Lv.11)

name: Steel Impact
info: Attack and has 30% chance to make target flinched.

name: Mega Steel Rush
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to the target 20% max HP (S.ATK Boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Mega Conflagration
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 30% * X damage, X = dead ally Pokemon. (S.ATK+2 Boost unlock at Lv.6, Burn effect unlock at Lv.11)

name: Mega Rush Hit
info: Attack and this attack may cause critical damage for 1.5 - 2.5 times (S.ATK Boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Volt Switch
info: Attack the target and deal damage. User attacks, then switches.

name: Magic Room
info: Held items have no effect for 5 turns.

name: Power Split
info: Averages ATK and S.ATK with the target, ignoring stat changes.

name: Flame Burst
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Damages Pokemon next to the target as well.

name: Horn Leech
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Leeches 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Psystrike
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Damage is based on the targets Defense stat.

name: Searing Shot
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

name: Land of Origin
info: Attack the target and has a 50% chance to reduce target S.ATK by 1 stage.

name: Giga Impact
info: Attack the target and has 50% chance to increase user DEF by 1 stage.

name: Dark Void
info: Opposing Pokemon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.

name: Mega Earthquake
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 30% lost HP of the target. (Knock Off Effect unlock at Lv.11)

name: Razor Shell
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This move have 50% chance to lower the target Defense by 1 stage.

name: Entrainment
info: Changes the target ability to that of the user.

name: Quash
info: This move forces the target to move last.

name: Snarl
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Lowers the target S.ATK by 1 stage.

name: Sea God Power
info: Increases user DEF and S.DEF by 1 stage.

name: Steel Cannon
info: Attack the target and has a 30% chance to flinch.

name: Doom Slash
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Mega Dark Matter
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 10% * X where X = Level gap. (Flinch unlock at Lv.6, Knock Off unlock at Lv.11)

name: Rage Rush
info: Randomly attack 3-5 times, power increase as skill level up (Poison Effect unlock at Lv.6, chance to Boost ATK+1 at Lv.11)

name: Electro Ball
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Inflicts more damage the faster the user is compared to the target.

name: Fiery Dance
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Has a 50% chance to boost the user S.ATK by 1 stage.

name: Shell Smash
info: Boosts the user ATK, S.ATK, and SPD by 2 stages and lowers its DEF and S.DEF by 1 stage.

name: Shift Gear
info: Boosts the user SPD by 2 stages and ATK by 1 stage.

name: Sea of Origin
info: Attack the target and has one higher chance to inflict critical damage.

name: Dragon Rush
info: Attack the target and has one higher chance to inflict critical damage.

name: Blasted Earth
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Super Water Gun
info: Attack the target and has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Mega Space Caos
info: Attack the target and cause extra damage equal to 10% * X damage if your level is higher, X = Level gap. (SPD+1 Boost unlock at Lv.6, S.ATK+2 Boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Dragon Swing
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Lighting Tornado Rush
info: Attack the target and has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Earthquake
info: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokemon around it.

name: Bug Bite
info: The user bites the target. if the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Mega Leaves Cut
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to current 20% HP of the target. (Bound Effect unlock at Lv.11)

name: Sunsteel Strike
info: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: Mega Psychic Wave
info: Attack and may cause extra damage equal to 1.5 - 2.5 times 30% lost HP of the target. (Paralysis Effect unlock at Lv.6, Knock Off Effect unlock at Lv.11)

name: Rage Horn Attack
info: Hit the target 3-5 times in a row. Higher level, higher power. (Knock Off unlock at Lv.6, chance to decrease target DEF-1 unlock at Lv.11)

name: Heart Stamp
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This move have 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

name: Tail Slap
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Hits 2-5 times in a row.

name: Heavy Slam
info: Deals more damage the heavier the user is compared to the target.

name: Echoed Voice
info: The power of this move increases when used consecutively by any ally.

name: Foul Play
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Uses the target ATK stat in damage calculation.

name: Dragon Tail
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Forces the target to switch to a random Pokemon. Priority -6.

name: Hurricane
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

name: Clear Smog
info: Eliminates the targets stat changes.

name: Calm Mind
info: It raises the user S.ATK and S.DEF by 1 stage.

name: Mirror Move
info: The user counters the target by mimicking the target last move.

name: Mega Izuna Drop
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to current 30% HP of the target. (Bound Effect unlock at Lv.6, ATK+2 boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Waveguide Slash
info: Attack target initially and deals damage. This move always goes first.

name: Mega Sky Rush
info: Attack and this move may cause critical damage for 1.5 - 2.5 times (ATK+2 boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Mega Thunder Shock
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to the target last damage taken. (Paralysis effect unlock at Lv.11)

name: Super Air Bomb
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 20% * X damage, X = battle turns. (Confused effect unlock at Lv.6, DEF+2 Boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Dual Chop
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Hit the target twice in a row.

name: Wild Charge
info: Attack the target and deal damage. User takes a quarter of damage dealt in recoil.

name: Quiver Dance
info: Boosts the user S.ATK, S.DEF and SPD by 1 stage.

name: Stored Power
info: Varies in power depending on the number of stat boosts accumulated by the user.

name: Incinerate
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Removes the opposing Pokemon Berry.

name: Guard Split
info: Averages the user DEF and S.DEF stats with the target, ignoring stat changes.

name: Simple Beam
info: This move changes the target ability to Simple. (Doubles the effect of stat changes.)

name: Inferno
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Burns the target.

name: Sacred Sword
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Ignores the targets stat changes.

name: Sandstorm Bite
info: Attack the target and has a 30% chance to flinch.

name: Steel Claw
info: Attack the target and has 50% chance to lower the enemy DEF 1 stage.

name: Sunbeam
info: Attack the target and has a 30% chance to increase user ATK by 1 stage.

name: Hyperspace Hole
info: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using Protect or Detect.

name: Black Light
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Dark Strike
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Torrent Burst
info: Attack the target and has one higher chance to inflict critical damage.

name: Aqua Jet
info: Attack the target and deal damage.

name: Phoenix Rage

name: Water Shuriken
info: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

name: Mega Dragon Rush
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 10% * X damage if your level is higher, X = Level gap. (S.ATK+2 Boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Mega Speedy Mash
info: Randomly attack 3-5 times, power increase as skill level up. (Paralysis Effect unlock at Lv.6, Knock Off Effect unlock at Lv.11)

name: Final Gambit
info: Causes the user to faint. Target takes damage equal to the user HP at the time of use.

name: Flame Charge
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Boosts the user SPD by 1 stage.

name: Ice Burn
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Hits on the second turn after being used. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

name: Devastating Hit
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Has a 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

name: Shadow Spread
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a 50% chance to lower the enemy DEF by 1 stage.

name: Water Impact
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a 50% chance to increase user ATK by 1 stage.

name: Inferno
info: Attack the target and deal damage. It has a 50% chance to decrease the target S.ATK by 1 stage.

name: Metal Pressure
info: Attack the target and has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Mega Magic Wave
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 30% lost HP of the target (Confusion Effect unlock at Lv.11)

name: Mega Rock Stream
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 30% * X damage, X = Number of fainted enemies. (Flinch Effect unlock at Lv.6, ATK+2 Boost unlock at Lv.12)

name: Chip Away
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Ignores the target stat changes.

name: Cotton Guard
info: Boosts the user DEF by 3 stages.

name: Freeze Shock
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Hits on the second turn after being used. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Shadow Spread
info: Restore 50% of Max HP and increase the user S.ATK by 1 stage.

name: Wonder Room
info: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon DEF and S.DEF stats are swapped for five turns.

name: Super Burst
info: Deals a fixed damage of 1,500.

name: Ultra Destroy
info: Attack the target and have 30% chance to flinch the target.

name: Primordial Sky Thunder
info: Hit the target 3-5 times in a row. Higher level, higher power. Lv 6 unlock ATK+2, Lv.11 unlock freeze.

name: Steamroller
info: Attack the target and deal damage. This move have 30% chance of causing the target to flinch.

name: Acid Spray
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Lowers the target S.DEF by 2 stages.

name: Round
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Power doubles if a teammate uses Round in the same turn.

name: Secret Sword
info: Attack the target and deal damage. Damage is based on the targets Defense stat.

name: Tornado Vortex
info: Attack the target and has a 50% chance to increase user S.ATK by 1 stage.

name: Millions Energy
info: Attack and cause extra damage equal to 1.5*X*Y damage, X = original damage, Y = self lost HP ratio. (Bound Effect unlock at Lv.6, S.DEF+2 Boost unlock at Lv.11)

name: Super Natural Charge
info: Attack the target with extra damage (damage * HP% lost * 1.5). Lv6 to unlock S.ATK +2, Lv 11 to unlock Confusion status.
